duties_responsibilities.duty: Processing permit applications and scheduling appointments.
Screening application information and determining project scope and process.
Posting public notices and responding to customer questions via phone and email.
Working with Accela, Zendesk, and GIS mapping technology to research, monitor, and correct workflow.
Monitoring the progress of applications via electronic filters and explaining department policies to customers.
Screening addresses and legal descriptions for proposed project sites and assigning permit numbers.
Providing virtual customer service through live chats and Q&A using Zendesk technology.
Monitoring application progress/status and responding to status inquiries.
Adhering to racial equity and social justice goals in work performance.

education_certification.credential: Two years of responsible clerical support experience in a regulatory or code enforcement program, technical research, or related technical field, including practical experience with automated record keeping systems.
Washington State Driver's License or evidence of equivalent mobility.
